participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Caring and passionate about music, Emma loves to share her knowledge with others. She has a playful side and enjoys discovering new experiences.
participant_1.background: my father played violin professionally. i'm a piano teacher on the side. i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Liam loves to play and sing. He has a vivid imagination and enjoys sharing his dreams of becoming a music teacher.
participant_2.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i am in the third grade.
